com.speedify.speedifysdk

Interface ISpeedifyHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpeedifyHandler

    public interface ISpeedifyHandler
    Event Callback Interface. All calls happen from main process unless otherwise noted. All calls are sent from background threads. It is recommened to extend from SpeedifyHandler.
    Since:
    5.6

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • UpdateForegroundNotification

        void UpdateForegroundNotification(android.app.Service service,
                                  Types.State state,
                                  java.lang.String serverName)
        Callback to show a notification of the service state. A default implementation is provided. If overriding, it is required on Oreo and higher that you call service.startForeground so that Android does not automatically stop the service after a few seconds. Prior to Oreo it is still recommended to use service.startForeground so that Android is less likely to destroy the service in low memory situations. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Parameters:
        service - Reference to the vpn service
        state - Current state
        serverName - Name of current server connected to
        Since:
        5.6

      • HideForegroundNotification

        void HideForegroundNotification(android.app.Service service)
        Callback when vpn service task is removed. If overriding UpdateForegroundNotification, use this to hide your notification. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Parameters:
        service - Reference to the vpn service
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceCreate

        void OnServiceCreate()
        Callback for vpn service OnCreate. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceDestroy

        void OnServiceDestroy()
        Callback for vpn service OnDestroy. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceRemoved

        void OnServiceRemoved()
        Callback for vpn service OnRemoved. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceRestart

        void OnServiceRestart()
        Callback when vpn service's onStartCommand is given START_FLAG_REDELIVERY flag. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process.
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceStartError

        boolean OnServiceStartError()
        Error starting the vpn service. The default handler uses the string resources SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_START_TITLE and SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_START_TEXT
        Returns:
        true if error is handled, false for default dialog
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceInternetPermissionError

        boolean OnServiceInternetPermissionError()
        Error when INTERNET permission has been revoked from the app. The default handler uses the string resources SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_SECURITY_TITLE and SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_SECURITY_TEXT
        Returns:
        true if error is handled, false for default dialog
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnServiceInterruptedError

        boolean OnServiceInterruptedError()
        Error when another VPN starts, interrupting Speedify. Called from secondary (:sdkservice) process. The default handler uses the string resources SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_REVOKED_TITLE and SPEEDIFY_ERROR_VPN_REVOKED_TEXT
        Returns:
        true if error is handled, false for default dialog
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnLoginError

        void OnLoginError(Types.ErrorType errorType,
                  java.lang.String message)
        Error when logging in
        Parameters:
        errorType - type of error
        message - error message
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnConnectError

        void OnConnectError(Types.ErrorType errorType,
                    java.lang.String message)
        Error when connecting to a server
        Parameters:
        errorType - type of error
        message - error message
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnState

        void OnState(Types.State state)
        State update received. This is sent on state updates, and every 30s while connected.
        Parameters:
        state - current state
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnConnectedServer

        void OnConnectedServer(Types.ServerInformation serverInfo)
        Connected update received. Send on start of connection attempt and connection completion.
        Parameters:
        serverInfo - currently connected server
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnAdaptersList

        void OnAdaptersList(java.util.List<Types.AdapterData> adapters)
        Network adapters list update received. Sent on changes and every 30s while connected to update usage data.
        Parameters:
        adapters - list of adapters
        Since:
        5.8

      • OnDirectory

        void OnDirectory(java.util.List<Types.ServerInformation> servers)
        Directory update received This list can be refreshed with SpeedifySDK.refreshDirectory()
        Parameters:
        servers - list of servers
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnConnectionStats

        void OnConnectionStats(Types.ConnectionStatsGroup tunnelStats)
        Latest tunnel stats update. Sent once per second while connected, if tunnel stat updates are enabled. via enableConnectionStatUpdates.
        Parameters:
        tunnelStats - a group of tunnelstats for a point in time
        Since:
        5.8

      • OnConnectionStats

        void OnConnectionStats(java.util.List<Types.ConnectionStatsGroup> tunnelStats)
        Historic tunnel stats update
        Parameters:
        tunnelStats - list of tunnelstats for a period of time
        Since:
        5.8

      • OnSessionStats

        void OnSessionStats(Types.SessionStats stats)
        Session stats update
        Parameters:
        stats - session stats
        Since:
        5.6

      • OnNewAdapter

        void OnNewAdapter(java.lang.String adapterID,
                  Types.NetworkType type)
        Notification for the first time seeing a new adapter. You must call handleNewAdapter on SpeedifySDK to clear this message. SpeedifyHandler's default implemenation does this automatically.
        Parameters:
        adapterID - ID of the adapter
        type - type of the adapter
        Since:
        7.3

      • OnAdapterOverlimit

        void OnAdapterOverlimit(java.lang.String adapterID,
                        Types.AdapterUsageData usageData)
        Notification when an adapter is near its daily or monthly data usage limit. This is called at 75% and 100% usage. You must call handleAdapterOverlimit on SpeedifySDK to clear this message. SpeedifyHandler's default implemenation does this automatically.
        Parameters:
        adapterID - ID of the adapter
        usageData - information on current usage of the adapter
        Since:
        5.8

      • OnSettings

        void OnSettings(Types.Settings settings)
        Notification on settings change
        Parameters:
        settings - the current settings
        Since:
        5.8

      • OnSpeedtestResults

        void OnSpeedtestResults(Types.SpeedTestResults testResults)
        Notification of speedtest progress
        Parameters:
        testResults - progress and results information
        Since:
        5.9

      • OnAppUsage

        void OnAppUsage(java.util.List<Types.AppUsage> appUsages)
        Notification of application usage information. This can be refreshed with refreshAppUsage
        Parameters:
        appUsages - array of application usage data
        Since:
        6.1

      • OnAccountingData

        void OnAccountingData(Types.AccountingData accounting)
        Accounting data update This can be refreshed with refreshAccounting
        Parameters:
        accounting - information on the current account
        Since:
        6.1

      • OnPrivacySettings

        void OnPrivacySettings(Types.PrivacySettings privacy)
        Privacy settings update This can be refreshed with refreshPrivacy
        Parameters:
        privacy - privacy settings
        Since:
        6.3
